Blessings of Self-denial. 

     24. The standard of truth must be planted in all countries, but the missionary work is not extended as it should be, because those in our offices of 
                                                                           42
publication, and the members of our churches, do not cultivate the precious plant of love, and do not follow in the footsteps of Him who was meek and lowly of heart. Jesus said, "If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me."
